item.title: Nippon Ichi Software UNTITLED// new titles presentation set for March 14
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/nippon-ichi-software-untitled-new-titles-presentation-set-for-march-14

Sequels and completely new titles to be announced.

Nippon Ichi Software will host the “Nippon Ichi Software UNTITLED//” new titles presentation on March 14 at 20:00 JST, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

The broadcast will consist of two parts. In the first half, Nippon Ichi Software president and CEO Kenzo Saruhashi will share information about new titles for the first time, as well as showcase gameplay images and illustrations from development. This includes “long-awaited sequel(s)” and “completely new title(s).” In the second half, Saruhashi will be joined by Asami Imai (voice actor for Emizel in Disgaea 4, Jupiel in The Awakened Fate Ultimatum) to recap and dive deeper into the content shown in the first half.

Stay tuned.

item.title: Horror puzzle action adventure game Ao Oni: The Horror of Blueberry Onsen announced for Switch, PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/horror-puzzle-action-adventure-game-ao-oni-the-horror-of-blueberry-onsen-announced-for-switch-pc

Game Studio has horror puzzle action adventure announced Ao Oni: The Horror of Blueberry Onsen for Switch and PC (Steam). It will launch this spring with English, Japanese, Korea, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish, and Indonesian language support.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Challenge yourself while being chased by fear! A horror puzzle action adventure!

A Completely New Version of the Legendary Horror Game Ao Oni

What is the new “blue tragedy” unfolding at the abandoned hot spring?

The once-popular hot spring inn known for its “beauty-enhancing hot spring” is now a ruin.

There was a rumor that it was haunted.

Hiroshi, Takeshi, Mika, and Takuro visit the abandoned hot spring inn to record “Mika Channel” and encounter a “suspicious man” and “Ai” there…

What is the Blueberry Hot Spring found in the abandoned inn, and what awaits them in its deepest depths…?

Can Hiroshi and the others escape safely?

Many New Systems Have Been Added

There are many new elements such as conversations with characters, cooperative play with friends, and a chat function.

In addition, many new species of blue demons appear! There is even a monster in the form of a humanoid dog…?

The Fastest Game Ever—“16x Speed Mode” Added

In “High Speed Mode” you can freely choose between 2x and 16x speed!

Can you escape from the “Ao Oni” chasing you at high speed?

Online Ranking Function Added

Participate in online ranking by your score when you clear the game!

Play quickly and without mistakes, and aim for a high score!

Watch a teaser trailer below.

item.title: Visual novel The Ancient Magus’ Bride: Midsummer’s Mirage and the Journey of Dreams announced for Switch – possibly PS5 and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/visual-novel-the-ancient-magus-bride-midsummers-mirage-and-the-journey-of-dreams-announced-for-switch-possibly-ps5-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Due out in 2025 in Japan (or possibly October 2).

Publisher Bushiroad Games has announced visual novel The Ancient Magus’ Bride: Midsummer’s Mirage and the Journey of Dreams for Switch. It will launch in 2025 in Japan.

The announcement comes via a teaser trailer, which features the logo, release window, and a background from the game.

However, as spotted by Twitter user Belserious, back in mid-February Bushiroad Games accidently published the YouTube premiere page for the game’s opening movie, which was planned to release on March 23. While the video itself was not viewable, the video thumbnail was:

As visible in the thumbnail, PlayStation 5 and PC (Steam) versions of The Ancient Magus’ Bride: Midsummer’s Mirage and the Journey of Dreams either are or were also planned, with a final release date of October 2 in Japan. Whether this information still holds true remains to be be seen when Bushiroad Games officially releases the opening movie.

Visit the teaser website here.
